None.Name: Bow Attack
None.Description: Every 2,5 second, unit fires arrows at enemies that deal 12 damage.

None.Name: Unholy Trance
None.Description: Unit becomes immobile and deals 16 damage for 10 seconds. After the effect wears off unit will still be immobile and unable to attack for another 20 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
